text:
@HouseGOP @realDonaldTrump ignored early coronavirus warning signs. Dismissed the seriousness of the threat. Attacked the advice of doctors and scientists. Failed to institute an adequate national plan for testing and contact tracing.
Now 150,000 Americans have died. This is on Trump
